.Plot
In this breathtaking documentary, narrator 
Harrison Ford takes viewers on a spectacular 
journey into unseen "lost worlds" of 
biodiversity - from a metropolis of 
micro-organisms beneath New York, through 
underwater Pacific forests, to the top of 
mysterious mountains in Venezuela.
